title: More Retroarch Cores
author: Libretro
details:
This package contains every RA core for wiiu that isn't included in the primary Retroarch package and the Arcade Cores package. This is a separate package due to long install time and filesizes.

Please be patient while installing. We may in the future split this package again, or remove it if RA itself on Wii U gains in-app core downloading.

The full list of cores here is:

2048
81
atari800
bk
bluemsx
cannonball
dosbox
dosbox_svn
ecwolf
fceumm
fixgb
fixmsx
fixnes

fuse

gw
hatari

mednafen_ngp
mednafen_pce_fast
mednafen_supergrafx
mednafen_vb
mednafen_wswan
mu
nekop2

o2em
pokemini
prboom
quasi88
quicknes

snes9x2002

snes9x2010

uzem
vba_next
vecx
vice_xcbm2
vice_xpet
vice_xplus4
vice_xvic
vitaquake2
x1
